description: Update the service sync blocker by resolving it.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the service sync blocker.

parameters.name: resolvedReason
parameters.description: The reason the service sync blocker was resolved.

nested_items.name: serviceInstanceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service instance that you want to update the service sync blocker for.

nested_items.name: serviceName
nested_items.description: The name of the service that you want to update the service sync blocker for.

nested_items.name: serviceSyncBlocker
nested_items.description: The detailed data on the service sync blocker that was updated.

nested_items.name: contexts
nested_items.description: The contexts for the sync blocker.

nested_items.name: key
nested_items.description: The key for the sync blocker context.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: The value of the sync blocker context.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the sync blocker was created.

nested_items.name: createdReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the sync blocker was created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the sync blocker.

nested_items.name: resolvedAt
nested_items.description: The time the sync blocker was resolved.

nested_items.name: resolvedReason
nested_items.description: The reason the sync blocker was resolved.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the sync blocker.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of the sync blocker.
